on_change.function: function updatePlayerData(currentFormData) {var sportKey = 'sports_page_select_sport'; var playerKey = 'sports_page_select_player'; var fieldDetails = (JSON.parse(currentFormData))['data']; var sportFieldData = JSON.parse(fieldDetails[sportKey]); var sport = sportFieldData[Object.keys(sportFieldData)[0]] || ''; var updatePlayerData = {}; updatePlayerData.success = true; var behaviourData = {}; var playerData = {}; playerData[playerKey] = []; behaviourData.dynamic_options = playerData; behaviourData.findForKey = sport; updatePlayerData.behaviour = JSON.stringify(behaviourData); return updatePlayerData;}

function updateScoreData(currentFormData) {var scoreKey = 'sports_page_set_score'; var playerKey = 'sports_page_select_player'; var fieldDetails = (JSON.parse(currentFormData))['data']; var playerFieldData = JSON.parse(fieldDetails[playerKey]); var player = playerFieldData[Object.keys(playerFieldData)[0]] || ''; var updateScoreData = {}; updateScoreData.success = true; var behaviourData = {}; var scoreData = {}; scoreData[scoreKey] = []; behaviourData.dynamic_options = scoreData; behaviourData.findForKey = player; updateScoreData.behaviour = JSON.stringify(behaviourData); return updateScoreData;}
